lines.text: create a function that finds the mid value of a , b and c
lines.code: int mid ( int a , int b , int c )

lines.text: if ( a > b AND a < c ) OR ( a > c AND a < b )
if first statement is false ( b > a AND b < c ) OR ( b < a AND b > c )
lines.code: else if ( ( b > a && b < c ) || ( b < a && b > c ) )

lines.text: if both if and if else are false
let a , b , c , x be integers and equal 0
lines.code: int a , b , c , sum = 0 , x ;

lines.text: read a , b , c or a into b into c
send a , b and c to function mid
let sum equal abs ( a - x ) + abs ( b - x ) + abs ( c - x )
lines.code: sum = abs ( a - x ) + abs ( b - x ) + abs ( c - x ) ;
